examples.example: 他在比赛中打出了一记漂亮的本垒打，赢得了全场的欢呼。

translate.english: He hit a beautiful home run in the game and won the cheers of the whole audience.

examples.example: 他在关键时刻打出了一记精彩的射门，为球队赢得了比赛。

translate.english: He scored a wonderful shot at the critical moment and won the game for the team.

examples.example: 他在关键时刻使出了一记妙招，成功解决了难题。

translate.english: He pulled out a brilliant move at the crucial moment and successfully solved the difficult problem.
